net.nicholaswilliams.java.licensing

Class License.Builder

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.nicholaswilliams.java.licensing.License.Builder
  • Enclosing class:
    License

    public static final class License.Builder
extends Object
    This class is responsible for all license creation. Each method in this class returns the builder instance to make chaining possible. To create a license, simply create an instance of a builder, set any values you wish to be set on the license (or choose not to set values, as appropriate), then call build().

    • Method Detail

      • withProductKey

        public License.Builder withProductKey(String productKey)
        Sets the product key for this license. The productKey, issuer, holder, and subject are symbolically named; they are interchangeable and can be used to hold any number of pieces of information. For example, one might use the holder to store a hardware ID, or the subject to store a product name and version combination.
        Parameters:
        productKey - The product key
        Returns:
        the builder instance.

      • withIssuer

        public License.Builder withIssuer(String issuer)
        Sets the issuer for this license. The productKey, issuer, holder, and subject are symbolically named; they are interchangeable and can be used to hold any number of pieces of information. For example, one might use the holder to store a hardware ID, or the subject to store a product name and version combination.
        Parameters:
        issuer - The license issuer
        Returns:
        the builder instance.

      • withHolder

        public License.Builder withHolder(String holder)
        Sets the holder for this license. The productKey, issuer, holder, and subject are symbolically named; they are interchangeable and can be used to hold any number of pieces of information. For example, one might use the holder to store a hardware ID, or the subject to store a product name and version combination.
        Parameters:
        holder - The license holder
        Returns:
        the builder instance.

      • withSubject

        public License.Builder withSubject(String subject)
        Sets the subject for this license. The productKey, issuer, holder, and subject are symbolically named; they are interchangeable and can be used to hold any number of pieces of information. For example, one might use the holder to store a hardware ID, or the subject to store a product name and version combination.
        Parameters:
        subject - The license subject
        Returns:
        the builder instance.

      • withGoodAfterDate

        public License.Builder withGoodAfterDate(long goodAfterDate)
        Sets the valid date (millisecond timestamp) for this license (usually the equal or close to the issue date, but that is not required.)
        Parameters:
        goodAfterDate - The date after which this license is valid
        Returns:
        the builder instance.

      • withGoodBeforeDate

        public License.Builder withGoodBeforeDate(long goodBeforeDate)
        Sets the expiration date (millisecond timestamp) for this license.
        Parameters:
        goodBeforeDate - The date after which this license is no longer valid
        Returns:
        the builder instance.

      • build

        public License build()
        Builds the license based on the criteria in this builder, then returns it.
        Returns:
        the completed license with all of the content specified by this builder.
